activities: Our web sites contain assessments to prepare our clients to participate in a workshop. The subject matter of the assessments may cover users job skills, work priorities, job conditions, or values. Assessments are filled out online and is secured by a user created password and SSL (Secured Socket Layer) during the transmission of any data. The assessments are stored on our secure servers. The Participant or a designated client administrators can print copies of the assessments to be used by the participant in their training.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
recoursemech: European Union Data Protection Authorities and the Swiss Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner
